name: Untitled Platformer Game (uzxlzkjsdlk)
description:
WARNING: This ain't the "Easy Platformer Game".

Dive into the jump-n-dash platformer game made by Team GrimTurkeys for the online jam hosted by Syntax - a Game Developers Organization of CIIT Philippines with the theme "Shift".

- Game Dev: Rito Ramos
- Level Designer: RV Santiago III

P.S. Updated version coming soon!
